TITLE Plum Cake

    # Heat oven to 350 degrees.
    # Rinse, half, and pit [24 item purple plums].
    # Cream [3/4 cup sugar] and [1/2 cup butter] in bowl.
    # Add [1 cup flour[, sifted]],[1 tsp baking powder], [1/16 tsp salt], [2 item eggs], and beat well.
    # Spoon the batter into a springform pan of 8-10 inches. 
    # Place the plum halves skin side up on top of the batter. 
    # Sprinkle lightly with [sugar] and [lemon juice], depending on the sweetness of the fruit. 
    # Optional, sprinkle with about [1 tsp cinnamon], depending on how much you like cinnamon.
    # Bake 1 hour, approximately. 
    # Remove and cool. Serve plain or with [whipped cream]. 
    * (To serve a torte that was frozen, defrost and reheat it briefly at 300 degrees.)
    * To freeze, double-wrap the torte in foil, place in a plastic bag and seal.
